text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm walking through the park on my<n>day off. It's so
peaceful today...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hit the deck!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I flinch instinctively at the sound of<n>Gold Ship's voice.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You there! Don't just stand<n>around—trouble's coming!
Danger!<n>Danger!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Darn, we can't stop now. This whole<n>place is about to
blow...

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text:
Cap'n Golshi, our advance is halted!<n>Permission to return to
jungle gym<n>base!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: Wait, we'd have to cross the hot lava<n>sandbox to get back!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Just follow me! You too, Trainer!<n>When we're backed into a
lava<n>corner, my Goldy-Gold Kenpo can<n>blast a way
through!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's nice to see Gold Ship playing with<n>the kids, but she's
roped me into the<n>game now...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Watch it, Trainer! That's a lava zone!<n>Your goose almost got
roasted!
choice_data_list: Sorry, I don't know the rules...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You're missing all of the heavenly<n>glory! Don't think,
feeeel! My trainer<n>should know better!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Let's do this, guys! Move ahead, I'll<n>handle the rear!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: I'll lead you all to victory... Cool, huh?

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Wooow! You're the greatest, Cap'n<n>Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Gold Ship heroically leads the children<n>and me across the
vast sandbox. But<n>then...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Gaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: C-Cap'n Golshi?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gold Ship has suddenly collapsed in<n>the sand!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Urk, looks like this is it for me... We<n>were almost home free,
but they got<n>me...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Listen, you've got to go on without<n>me... You have to... live!
...Ugh.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: No... Please wake up, Cap'n Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The scene of the crime was locked<n>down, and no murder
weapon found.<n>Every single suspect has an alibi...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
With nothing to go on, this case might<n>go cold. But don't you
worry! Crime<n>never escapes the great Sherlock<n>Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Boys
text_block_list.text: It's really her! Sherlock Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Hmm! Hmmm?! My bedazzling<n>brain cells of a
5,640,000 IQ have just<n>burst into action!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
The offender who shot me was... You,<n>ya dirty ol' rotten
jerk head!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She's pointing at me! What should I<n>do...

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: You gotta say somethin' back or<n>you'll lose!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, yeah! You're Golshi's trainer<n>for a reason. Do
something funny!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I get it... I can't let her steer the ship<n>all the time. I need to be
like these kids<n>and go with the flow!
choice_data_list: You caught me! But I'll have the last laugh!
You caught me! But I'll have the last laugh!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Agh, so this is your true form! Those<n>thirty purple tentacles
sprouting from<n>your head prove it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
But what now? I can't take on this<n>villain in my current
form! Everyone,<n>retreat!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... wheeze... How didyou follow me all the way here?

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: What now... We're cornered!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hmph, like I have any money... But I<n>do have this!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I am the great Umamusume goddess,<n>Golshaea. I see kind
hearts in need of<n>aid and bestow unto you my power.

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: It's Golshaea. She only grants 100<n>miracles a year!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I can feel it! You all sense it too, don't<n>you? It's the power
of the goddess!

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Whoa, it's true! We can win this time!
choice_data_list:
What have you done? Curse your goddess
power!

What have you done? Curse your goddess
power!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
It's flowing through us! Our combined<n>power level is over
5,640,000!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
You'll never complete your evil plan,<n>villain! Prepare to
taste... the Golshi<n>Revenginator!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Collapse!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Justice has been... served!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text: You did it! You're the awesomest,<n>Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Another day where I'm not really<n>sure what happened... But
it was<n>surprisingly fun to go along with Gold<n>Ship's goofy
games.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Woooo! We pulled through okay!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: We protected the park, caught thecriminal, turned me into a god,and achieved world peace!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Not to mention the flowers bloomed,<n>the trees grew lush,
and the birds<n>sang beautifully! I even impress<n>myself!
choice_data_list: Plus those kids sure had a lot of fun.
Plus those kids sure had a lot of fun.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
How could they not? I don't ever let<n>boredom strike, even
for a split<n>second!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: And you know, you weren't too bad<n>at it yourself!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I think I got a little better at keeping up<n>with Gold Ship today!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
I just remembered. I should finish<n>those Nazca lines I
started drawing in<n>the school garden!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: You should come with! Meet in three<n>secs! Bye!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: ...It might be a while longer until I can<n>fully keep up though.
